definitions.definition: A sticky , black to brown and highly viscous liquid or semi-solid, composed almost entirely of bitumen with small mineral particles, that is present in most crude petroleums and in some natural deposits.
Ellipsis of asphalt concrete , a hard ground covering used for roads and walkways .

main_definition: A sticky , black to brown and highly viscous liquid or semi-solid, composed almost entirely of bitumen with small mineral particles, that is present in most crude petroleums and in some natural deposits.
secondary_definitions: Ellipsis of asphalt concrete , a hard ground covering used for roads and walkways .
